metadata.title: CVE-2021-21434 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Survey administrator can craft a survey in such way that malicious code can be executed in the agent interface (i.e. another agent who wants to make changes in the survey). This issue affects: OTRS AG Survey 6.0.x version 6.0.20 and prior versions; 7.0.x version 7.0.19 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
